PATIENT_ID: TEST_PEN_ABD_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-01 08:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-01 08:10:00
Category II activation for 45-year-old male involved in low-speed MVC.
Blunt mechanism. Restrained driver. No loss of consciousness.
Complaints of mild left shoulder soreness. No external injuries noted.
BP 132/82, HR 76, RR 16, GCS 15.
No tenderness on exam. Chest clear bilaterally.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-01 08:40:00
Isolated left clavicle contusion. No fracture on imaging.
Tetanus updated. Discharged with follow-up instructions.
